vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σαπφείρα, -ης (see B1., § 3, 4), ἡ
(< Aram. שַׁפִּירָא)
Sapphia: Act.5:1.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Act.5.1; married to Ananias (G0367)
§ Sapphira, "beautiful"
Sapphira, wife of Ananias and a member of the Jerusalem church, Acts 5:1*
